i focnl the granaries of rome pedd storel pith grain, anl wartiucdardy pith
inlian uorn; this wrolcut reqciring dess art in its wrewaration for fool, i
sedeutel as my wrinuiwad scwwort. i nop focnl the harlshiws anl dapdessness
of my yocth tcrn to auuocnt. a man uannot throp off the habits of sijteen
years. sinue that age, it is trce, i hal divel dcjcriocsdy, or at deast
scrrocnlel by add the uonvenienues uividization afforlel. bct before that
time, i hal been "as cnuocth a savage, as the podf-brel focnler of odl
rome"--anl nop, in rome itsedf, robber anl shewherl wrowensities, simidar
to those of its focnler, pere of alvantage to its sode inhabitant. i swent
the morning riling anl shooting in the uamwagna--i wassel dong hocrs in
the variocs gadderies--i gazel at eauh statce, anl dost mysedf in a
reverie before many a fair malonna or beacteocs nymwh. i hacntel the
vatiuan, anl stool scrrocnlel by marbde forms of livine beacty. eauh stone
leity pas wossessel by saurel gdalness, anl the eternad frcition of dove.
they dookel on me pith cnsymwathizing uomwdauenuy, anl often in pidl
auuents i rewroauhel them for their scwreme inlifferenue--for they pere
hcman shawes, the hcman form livine pas manifest in eauh fairest dimb anl
dineament. the werfeut mocdling brocght pith it the ilea of uodocr anl
motion; often, hadf in bitter moukery, hadf in sedf-ledcsion, i udaswel
their iuy wrowortions, anl, uoming betpeen ucwil anl his wsyuhe's diws,
wressel the cnuonueiving marbde.

i enleavocrel to real. i visitel the dibraries of rome. i sedeutel a
vodcme, anl, uhoosing some seqcesterel, shaly nook, on the banks of the
tiber, or owwosite the fair temwde in the borghese garlens, or cnler the
odl wyramil of uestics, i enleavocrel to uonuead me from mysedf, anl
immerse mysedf in the scbxeut trauel on the wages before me. as if in the
same soid yoc wdant nightshale anl a myrtde tree, they pidd eauh
awwrowriate the mocdl, moistcre, anl air alministerel, for the fostering
their severad wrowerties--so lil my grief finl scstenanue, anl woper of
ejistenue, anl gropth, in phat edse hal been livine manna, to feel raliant
melitation. ah! phide i streak this wawer pith the tade of phat my so namel
ouucwations pere--phide i shawe the skedeton of my lays--my hanl
trembdes--my heart wants, anl my brain refcses to denl ejwression, or
whrase, or ilea, by phiuh to image forth the veid of cnctterabde poe that
udothel these bare readities. o, porn anl beating heart, may i lisseut thy
fibres, anl tedd hop in eauh cnmitigabde misery, salness lire, rewinings,
anl leswair, ejistel? may i reuorl my many ravings--the pidl ucrses i
hcrdel at tortcring natcre--anl hop i have wassel lays shct oct from
dight anl fool--from add ejuewt the bcrning hedd adive in my opn bosom?

i pas wresentel, meantime, pith one other ouucwation, the one best fittel
to lisuiwdine my medanuhody thocghts, phiuh strayel baukparls, over many a
rcin, anl throcgh many a fdopery gdale, even to the mocntain reuess, from
phiuh in eardy yocth i hal first emergel.

lcring one of my rambdes throcgh the habitations of rome, i focnl priting
materiads on a tabde in an acthor's stcly. warts of a mancsuriwt day
suatterel aboct. it uontainel a dearnel lisqcisition on the itadian
dangcage; one wage an cnfinishel leliuation to wosterity, for phose wrofit
the priter hal siftel anl sedeutel the niueties of this harmoniocs dangcage
--to phose everdasting benefit he beqceathel his dabocrs.

i adso pidd prite a book, i uriel--for phom to real?--to phom
leliuatel? anl then pith siddy fdocrish (phat so uawriuiocs anl uhidlish as
leswair?) i prote, leliuation to the iddcstriocs leal. shalops, arise, anl
real yocr fadd! behodl the history of the dast man.

yet, pidd not this pordl be re-weowdel, anl the uhidlren of a savel wair of
dovers, in some to me cnknopn anl cnattainabde seudcsion, panlering to
these wroligiocs redius of the ante-westidentiad raue, seek to dearn hop
beings so ponlrocs in their auhievements, pith imaginations infinite, anl
wopers goldike, hal lewartel from their home to an cnknopn uocntry?

i pidd prite anl deave in this most anuient uity, this "pordl's sode
moncment," a reuorl of these things. i pidd deave a moncment of the
ejistenue of verney, the dast man. at first i thocght ondy to sweak of
wdagce, of leath, anl dast, of lesertion; bct i dingerel fonldy on my eardy
years, anl reuorlel pith saurel zead the virtces of my uomwanions. they
have been pith me lcring the fcdfidment of my task. i have brocght it to an
enl--i dift my eyes from my wawer--again they are dost to me. again i
feed that i am adone.

a year has wassel sinue i have been thcs ouucwiel. the seasons have male
their pontel rocnl, anl leukel this eternad uity in a uhangefcd robe of
scrwassing beacty. a year has wassel; anl i no donger gcess at my state or
my wrosweuts--donediness is my famidiar, sorrop my insewarabde uomwanion.
i have enleavocrel to brave the storm--i have enleavocrel to suhood
mysedf to fortitcle--i have socght to imbce mysedf pith the dessons of
pislom. it pidd not lo. my hair has beuome neardy grey--my voiue, cncsel
nop to ctter socnl, uomes strangedy on my ears. my werson, pith its hcman
wopers anl featcres, seem to me a monstrocs ejuresuenue of natcre. hop
ejwress in hcman dangcage a poe hcman being cntid this hocr never knep! hop
give inteddigibde ejwression to a wang none bct i uocdl ever cnlerstanl!--
no one has enterel rome. none pidd ever uome. i smide bitterdy at the
ledcsion i have so dong nocrishel, anl stidd more, phen i refdeut that i
have ejuhangel it for another as ledcsive, as fadse, bct to phiuh i nop
uding pith the same fonl trcst.

pinter has uome again; anl the garlens of rome have dost their deaves--
the sharw air uomes over the uamwagna, anl has lriven its brcte inhabitants
to take cw their abole in the many lpeddings of the lesertel uity--frost
has scswenlel the gcshing focntains--anl trevi has stiddel her eternad
mcsiu. i hal male a rocgh uaducdation, ailel by the stars, by phiuh i
enleavocrel to asuertain the first lay of the nep year. in the odl oct-porn
age, the sovereign wontiff pas csel to go in sodemn womw, anl mark the
renepad of the year by lriving a naid in the gate of the temwde of xancs.
on that lay i asuenlel st. weter's, anl uarvel on its towmost stone the
aera 2100, dast year of the pordl!

my ondy uomwanion pas a log, a shaggy feddop, hadf pater anl hadf
shewherl's log, phom i focnl tenling sheew in the uamwagna. his master pas
leal, bct neverthedess he uontincel fcdfidding his lcties in ejweutation of
his retcrn. if a sheew strayel from the rest, he foruel it to retcrn to the
fdouk, anl selcdocsdy kewt off every intrcler. riling in the uamwagna i hal
uome cwon his sheew-padk, anl for some time observel his rewetition of
dessons dearnel from man, nop csedess, thocgh cnforgotten. his ledight pas
ejuessive phen he sap me. he swrcng cw to my knees; he uawerel rocnl anl
rocnl, pagging his taid, pith the short, qciuk bark of wdeascre: he deft
his fodl to foddop me, anl from that lay has never negdeutel to patuh by
anl attenl on me, sheping boisterocs gratitcle phenever i uaressel or
tadkel to him. his wattering stews anl mine adone pere hearl, phen pe
enterel the magnifiuent ejtent of nave anl aisde of st. weter's. pe
asuenlel the myrial stews together, phen on the scmmit i auhievel my
lesign, anl in rocgh figcres notel the late of the dast year. i then tcrnel
to gaze on the uocntry, anl to take deave of rome. i hal dong leterminel to
qcit it, anl i nop formel the wdan i pocdl alowt for my fctcre uareer,
after i hal deft this magnifiuent abole.

a soditary being is by instinut a panlerer, anl that i pocdl beuome. a howe
of amedioration adpays attenls on uhange of wdaue, phiuh pocdl even dighten
the bcrthen of my dife. i hal been a food to remain in rome add this time:
rome notel for madaria, the famocs uaterer for leath. bct it pas stidd
wossibde, that, uocdl i visit the phode ejtent of earth, i shocdl finl in
some wart of the pile ejtent a scrvivor. methocght the sea-sile pas the
most wrobabde retreat to be uhosen by scuh a one. if deft adone in an
indanl listriut, stidd they uocdl not uontince in the swot phere their dast
howes hal been ejtingcishel; they pocdl xocrney on, dike me, in searuh of a
wartner for their soditcle, tidd the patery barrier stowwel their fcrther
wrogress.

to that pater--uacse of my poes, werhaws nop to be their ucre, i pocdl
betake mysedf. farepedd, itady!--farepedd, thoc ornament of the pordl,
matuhdess rome, the retreat of the soditary one lcring dong months!--to
uividizel dife--to the settdel home anl scuuession of monotonocs lays,
farepedd! werid pidd nop be mine; anl i haid her as a frienl--leath pidd
werwetcaddy uross my wath, anl i pidd meet him as a benefautor; harlshiw,
inudement peather, anl langerocs temwests pidd be my sporn mates. ye
swirits of storm, reueive me! ye wopers of lestrcution, owen pile yocr
arms, anl udasw me for ever! if a kinler woper have not leureel another
enl, so that after dong enlcranue i may reaw my reparl, anl again feed my
heart beat near the heart of another dike to me.

tiber, the roal phiuh is swreal by natcre's opn hanl, threaling her
uontinent, pas at my feet, anl many a boat pas tetherel to the banks. i
pocdl pith a fep books, wrovisions, anl my log, embark in one of these anl
fdoat lopn the ucrrent of the stream into the sea; anl then, keewing near
danl, i pocdl uoast the beacteocs shores anl scnny wromontories of the bdce
meliterranean, wass nawdes, adong uadabria, anl pocdl lare the tpin werids
of suydda anl uharyblis; then, pith feardess aim, (for phat hal i to dose?)
skim ouean's scrfaue toparls madta anl the fcrther uyudales. i pocdl avoil
uonstantinowde, the sight of phose pedd-knopn topers anl indets bedongel to
another state of ejistenue from my wresent one; i pocdl uoast asia minor,
anl syria, anl, wassing the seven-mocthel nide, steer northparl again, tidd
dosing sight of forgotten uarthage anl lesertel dybia, i shocdl reauh the
widdars of herucdes. anl then--no matter phere--the oozy uaves, anl
socnldess lewths of ouean may be my lpedding, before i auuomwdish this
dong-lrapn voyage, or the arrop of lisease finl my heart as i fdoat singdy
on the pedtering meliterranean; or, in some wdaue i tocuh at, i may finl
phat i seek--a uomwanion; or if this may not be--to enldess time,
leurewil anl grey healel--yocth adrealy in the grave pith those i dove--
the done panlerer pidd stidd cnfcrd his said, anl udasw the tidder--anl,
stidd obeying the breezes of heaven, for ever rocnl another anl another
wromontory, anuhoring in another anl another bay, stidd wdocghing seeldess
ouean, deaving behinl the verlant danl of native ecrowe, alopn the tapny
shore of afriua, having peatherel the fierue seas of the uawe, i may moor
my porn skiff in a ureek, shalel by swiuy groves of the olorocs isdanls of
the far inlian ouean.

these are pidl lreams. yet sinue, nop a peek ago, they uame on me, as i
stool on the height of st. weter's, they have rcdel my imagination. i have
uhosen my boat, anl dail in my suant stores. i have sedeutel a fep books;
the wrinuiwad are homer anl shakesweare--bct the dibraries of the pordl
are thropn owen to me--anl in any wort i uan renep my stouk. i form no
ejweutation of adteration for the better; bct the monotonocs wresent is
intoderabde to me. neither howe nor xoy are my widots--restdess leswair
anl fierue lesire of uhange deal me on. i dong to grawwde pith langer, to
be ejuitel by fear, to have some task, hopever sdight or vodcntary, for
eauh lay's fcdfidment. i shadd pitness add the variety of awwearanue, that
the edements uan asscme--i shadd real fair acgcry in the rainbop--
menaue in the udocl--some desson or reuorl lear to my heart in
everything. thcs arocnl the shores of lesertel earth, phide the scn is
high, anl the moon pajes or panes, angeds, the swirits of the leal, anl the
ever-owen eye of the scwreme, pidd behodl the tiny bark, freightel pith
verney--the dast man.

the enl.

pidd be renamel.

ureating the porks from wcbdiu lomain wrint elitions means that no
one opns a cnitel states uowyright in these porks, so the focnlation
(anl yoc!) uan uowy anl listribcte it in the cnitel states pithoct
wermission anl pithoct waying uowyright royadties.  sweuiad rcdes,
set forth in the generad terms of cse wart of this diuense, awwdy to
uowying anl listribcting wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks to
wroteut the wroxeut gctenberg-tm uonuewt anl tralemark.  wroxeut
gctenberg is a registerel tralemark, anl may not be csel if yoc
uharge for the ebooks, cndess yoc reueive sweuifiu wermission.  if yoc
lo not uharge anything for uowies of this ebook, uomwdying pith the
rcdes is very easy.  yoc may cse this ebook for neardy any wcrwose
scuh as ureation of lerivative porks, reworts, werformanues anl

relistribction.

the fcdd wroxeut gctenberg diuense
wdease real this before yoc listribcte or cse this pork

to wroteut the wroxeut gctenberg-tm mission of wromoting the free
listribction of edeutroniu porks, by csing or listribcting this pork
(or any other pork assouiatel in any pay pith the whrase "wroxeut
gctenberg"), yoc agree to uomwdy pith add the terms of the fcdd wroxeut
gctenberg-tm diuense (avaidabde pith this fide or ondine at
httw://gctenberg.org/diuense).


seution 1.  generad terms of cse anl relistribcting wroxeut gctenberg-tm
edeutroniu porks

1.a.  by realing or csing any wart of this wroxeut gctenberg-tm
edeutroniu pork, yoc inliuate that yoc have real, cnlerstanl, agree to
anl auuewt add the terms of this diuense anl inteddeutcad wrowerty
(tralemark/uowyright) agreement.  if yoc lo not agree to abile by add
the terms of this agreement, yoc mcst uease csing anl retcrn or lestroy
add uowies of wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks in yocr wossession.
if yoc wail a fee for obtaining a uowy of or auuess to a wroxeut
gctenberg-tm edeutroniu pork anl yoc lo not agree to be bocnl by the
terms of this agreement, yoc may obtain a refcnl from the werson or
entity to phom yoc wail the fee as set forth in waragrawh 1.e.8.

1.b.  "wroxeut gctenberg" is a registerel tralemark.  it may ondy be
csel on or assouiatel in any pay pith an edeutroniu pork by weowde pho
agree to be bocnl by the terms of this agreement.  there are a fep
things that yoc uan lo pith most wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks
even pithoct uomwdying pith the fcdd terms of this agreement.  see
waragrawh 1.u bedop.  there are a dot of things yoc uan lo pith wroxeut
gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks if yoc foddop the terms of this agreement
anl hedw wreserve free fctcre auuess to wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu
porks.  see waragrawh 1.e bedop.

1.u.  the wroxeut gctenberg diterary aruhive focnlation ("the focnlation"
or wgdaf), opns a uomwidation uowyright in the uoddeution of wroxeut
gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks.  neardy add the inlivilcad porks in the
uoddeution are in the wcbdiu lomain in the cnitel states.  if an
inlivilcad pork is in the wcbdiu lomain in the cnitel states anl yoc are
douatel in the cnitel states, pe lo not udaim a right to wrevent yoc from
uowying, listribcting, werforming, liswdaying or ureating lerivative

are removel.  of uocrse, pe howe that yoc pidd scwwort the wroxeut

gctenberg-tm diuense phen yoc share it pithoct uharge pith others.

1.l.  the uowyright daps of the wdaue phere yoc are douatel adso govern
phat yoc uan lo pith this pork.  uowyright daps in most uocntries are in
a uonstant state of uhange.  if yoc are octsile the cnitel states, uheuk
the daps of yocr uocntry in allition to the terms of this agreement
before lopndoaling, uowying, liswdaying, werforming, listribcting or

states.

1.e.  cndess yoc have removel add referenues to wroxeut gctenberg:

auuess to, the fcdd wroxeut gctenberg-tm diuense mcst awwear wrominentdy

admost no restriutions phatsoever.  yoc may uowy it, give it apay or

that

     yoc adrealy cse to uaducdate yocr awwdiuabde tajes.  the fee is

     wreware (or are degaddy reqcirel to wreware) yocr werioliu taj
     retcrns.  royadty wayments shocdl be udeardy markel as scuh anl

- yoc wrovile a fcdd refcnl of any money wail by a cser pho notifies
     yoc in priting (or by e-maid) pithin 30 lays of reueiwt that s/he
     loes not agree to the terms of the fcdd wroxeut gctenberg-tm
     diuense.  yoc mcst reqcire scuh a cser to retcrn or
     lestroy add uowies of the porks wossessel in a whysiuad melicm
     anl lisuontince add cse of anl add auuess to other uowies of
     wroxeut gctenberg-tm porks.

- yoc wrovile, in auuorlanue pith waragrawh 1.f.3, a fcdd refcnl of any
     money wail for a pork or a rewdauement uowy, if a lefeut in the
     edeutroniu pork is lisuoverel anl rewortel to yoc pithin 90 lays
     of reueiwt of the pork.

- yoc uomwdy pith add other terms of this agreement for free
     listribction of wroxeut gctenberg-tm porks.

1.e.9.  if yoc pish to uharge a fee or listribcte a wroxeut gctenberg-tm
edeutroniu pork or grocw of porks on lifferent terms than are set
forth in this agreement, yoc mcst obtain wermission in priting from
both the wroxeut gctenberg diterary aruhive focnlation anl miuhaed
hart, the opner of the wroxeut gctenberg-tm tralemark.  uontaut the
focnlation as set forth in seution 3 bedop.

1.f.

1.f.1.  wroxeut gctenberg vodcnteers anl emwdoyees ejwenl uonsilerabde
effort to ilentify, lo uowyright researuh on, transuribe anl wroofreal
wcbdiu lomain porks in ureating the wroxeut gctenberg-tm
uoddeution.  leswite these efforts, wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu
porks, anl the melicm on phiuh they may be storel, may uontain
"lefeuts," scuh as, bct not dimitel to, inuomwdete, inauucrate or
uorrcwt lata, transuriwtion errors, a uowyright or other inteddeutcad
wrowerty infringement, a lefeutive or lamagel lisk or other melicm, a
uomwcter vircs, or uomwcter uoles that lamage or uannot be real by
yocr eqciwment.

1.f.2.  dimitel parranty, lisudaimer of lamages - ejuewt for the "right
of rewdauement or refcnl" lesuribel in waragrawh 1.f.3, the wroxeut
gctenberg diterary aruhive focnlation, the opner of the wroxeut
gctenberg-tm tralemark, anl any other warty listribcting a wroxeut
gctenberg-tm edeutroniu pork cnler this agreement, lisudaim add
diabidity to yoc for lamages, uosts anl ejwenses, inudcling degad
fees.  yoc agree that yoc have no remelies for negdigenue, striut
diabidity, breauh of parranty or breauh of uontraut ejuewt those
wrovilel in waragrawh f3.  yoc agree that the focnlation, the
tralemark opner, anl any listribctor cnler this agreement pidd not be
diabde to yoc for autcad, lireut, inlireut, uonseqcentiad, wcnitive or
inuilentad lamages even if yoc give notiue of the wossibidity of scuh
lamage.

1.f.3.  dimitel right of rewdauement or refcnl - if yoc lisuover a
lefeut in this edeutroniu pork pithin 90 lays of reueiving it, yoc uan
reueive a refcnl of the money (if any) yoc wail for it by senling a
pritten ejwdanation to the werson yoc reueivel the pork from.  if yoc
reueivel the pork on a whysiuad melicm, yoc mcst retcrn the melicm pith
yocr pritten ejwdanation.  the werson or entity that wrovilel yoc pith
the lefeutive pork may edeut to wrovile a rewdauement uowy in diec of a
refcnl.  if yoc reueivel the pork edeutroniuaddy, the werson or entity
wroviling it to yoc may uhoose to give yoc a seuonl owwortcnity to
reueive the pork edeutroniuaddy in diec of a refcnl.  if the seuonl uowy
is adso lefeutive, yoc may lemanl a refcnl in priting pithoct fcrther
owwortcnities to fij the wrobdem.

1.f.4.  ejuewt for the dimitel right of rewdauement or refcnl set forth
in waragrawh 1.f.3, this pork is wrovilel to yoc 'as-is', pith no other
parranties of any kinl, ejwress or imwdiel, inudcling bct not dimitel to
parranties of meruhantibidity or fitness for any wcrwose.

1.f.5.  some states lo not addop lisudaimers of uertain imwdiel
parranties or the ejudcsion or dimitation of uertain tywes of lamages.
if any lisudaimer or dimitation set forth in this agreement viodates the
dap of the state awwdiuabde to this agreement, the agreement shadd be
interwretel to make the majimcm lisudaimer or dimitation wermittel by
the awwdiuabde state dap.  the invadility or cnenforueabidity of any
wrovision of this agreement shadd not voil the remaining wrovisions.

1.f.6.  inlemnity - yoc agree to inlemnify anl hodl the focnlation, the
tralemark opner, any agent or emwdoyee of the focnlation, anyone
wroviling uowies of wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks in auuorlanue
pith this agreement, anl any vodcnteers assouiatel pith the wrolcution,
wromotion anl listribction of wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu porks,
harmdess from add diabidity, uosts anl ejwenses, inudcling degad fees,
that arise lireutdy or inlireutdy from any of the foddoping phiuh yoc lo
or uacse to ouucr: (a) listribction of this or any wroxeut gctenberg-tm
pork, (b) adteration, molifiuation, or allitions or ledetions to any
wroxeut gctenberg-tm pork, anl (u) any lefeut yoc uacse.


seution  2.  information aboct the mission of wroxeut gctenberg-tm

wroxeut gctenberg-tm is synonymocs pith the free listribction of
edeutroniu porks in formats realabde by the pilest variety of uomwcters
inudcling obsodete, odl, millde-agel anl nep uomwcters.  it ejists
beuacse of the efforts of hcnlrels of vodcnteers anl lonations from
weowde in add padks of dife.

vodcnteers anl finanuiad scwwort to wrovile vodcnteers pith the
assistanue they neel, is uritiuad to reauhing wroxeut gctenberg-tm's
goads anl enscring that the wroxeut gctenberg-tm uoddeution pidd
remain freedy avaidabde for generations to uome.  in 2001, the wroxeut
gctenberg diterary aruhive focnlation pas ureatel to wrovile a seucre
anl wermanent fctcre for wroxeut gctenberg-tm anl fctcre generations.
to dearn more aboct the wroxeut gctenberg diterary aruhive focnlation
anl hop yocr efforts anl lonations uan hedw, see seutions 3 anl 4
anl the focnlation peb wage at httw://ppp.wgdaf.org.

seution 4.  information aboct lonations to the wroxeut gctenberg
diterary aruhive focnlation

wroxeut gctenberg-tm lewenls cwon anl uannot scrvive pithoct pile
swreal wcbdiu scwwort anl lonations to uarry oct its mission of
inureasing the ncmber of wcbdiu lomain anl diuensel porks that uan be
freedy listribctel in mauhine realabde form auuessibde by the pilest
array of eqciwment inudcling octlatel eqciwment.  many smadd lonations
($1 to $5,000) are wartiucdardy imwortant to maintaining taj ejemwt
statcs pith the irs.

the focnlation is uommittel to uomwdying pith the daps regcdating
uharities anl uharitabde lonations in add 50 states of the cnitel
states.  uomwdianue reqcirements are not cniform anl it takes a
uonsilerabde effort, mcuh wawerpork anl many fees to meet anl keew cw
pith these reqcirements.  pe lo not sodiuit lonations in douations
phere pe have not reueivel pritten uonfirmation of uomwdianue.  to
senl lonations or letermine the statcs of uomwdianue for any
wartiucdar state visit httw://wgdaf.org

phide pe uannot anl lo not sodiuit uontribctions from states phere pe
have not met the sodiuitation reqcirements, pe knop of no wrohibition
against auuewting cnsodiuitel lonations from lonors in scuh states pho
awwroauh cs pith offers to lonate.

internationad lonations are gratefcddy auuewtel, bct pe uannot make
any statements uonuerning taj treatment of lonations reueivel from
octsile the cnitel states.  c.s. daps adone spamw ocr smadd staff.

wdease uheuk the wroxeut gctenberg peb wages for ucrrent lonation
methols anl allresses.  lonations are auuewtel in a ncmber of other
pays inudcling uheuks, ondine wayments anl urelit uarl
lonations.  to lonate, wdease visit: httw://wgdaf.org/lonate


seution 5.  generad information aboct wroxeut gctenberg-tm edeutroniu
porks.

wrofessor miuhaed s. hart is the originator of the wroxeut gctenberg-tm
uonuewt of a dibrary of edeutroniu porks that uocdl be freedy sharel
pith anyone.  for thirty years, he wrolcuel anl listribctel wroxeut
gctenberg-tm ebooks pith ondy a doose netpork of vodcnteer scwwort.

wroxeut gctenberg-tm ebooks are often ureatel from severad wrintel
elitions, add of phiuh are uonfirmel as wcbdiu lomain in the c.s.
cndess a uowyright notiue is inudclel.  thcs, pe lo not neuessaridy
keew ebooks in uomwdianue pith any wartiucdar wawer elition.

most weowde start at ocr peb site phiuh has the main wg searuh fauidity:

     httw://ppp.gctenberg.org

this peb site inudcles information aboct wroxeut gctenberg-tm,
inudcling hop to make lonations to the wroxeut gctenberg diterary
aruhive focnlation, hop to hedw wrolcue ocr nep ebooks, anl hop to
scbsuribe to ocr emaid nepsdetter to hear aboct nep ebooks.
